author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-3543 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: text/xml on ajax requests with webkit mobile browser

author: jwross
msg: (1) Fixed issue in tests where an INSTALLED state change was expected during the uninstall process for a subsystem starting from the INSTALLED state.
(2) Refactored install and uninstall code. Broke functionality out into dedicated ResourceInstaller and ResourceUninstaller classes.
(3) Consolidated all primary data structures into dedicated Subsystems class.

author: cframpton
msg: Produce tar.gz kits for Unix with execute set on script files in bin directory (no extension) and other *.sh scripts in the tree.  For now, the sources in both the zip kit and the unix kit will have Windows style line endings since most Unix editors can handle Windows line endings and the reverse is not true.  Remove the AIR SDK stuff since it is no longer being packaged with Flex.

author: kkolinko
msg: Allow "catalina.bat run" to work even if %TEMP% contains spaces.
For all other commands that code is skipped, thanks to [if not ""%1"" == ""run""] jump.
- Single doublequotes are already used in "%TEMP%\%~nx0.run". The %TEMP% value cannot be quoted.

author: coheigea
msg: Check that the received Issuer for SAML Web SSO is a prefix of the configured IDP rather than match the Strings directly
